mapper.update: update t_user set UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserNickname = #{usernickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PassWord = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PersonalSign = #{personalsign,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ImageSrc = #{imagesrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, UserName, UserNickname, PassWord, PersonalSign, ImageSrc from t_user where UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PassWord = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, UserName, UserNickname, PassWord, PersonalSign, ImageSrc from t_user
